ComicInfo.Title: Beast Heart Strikers: Part 3; Accel
ComicInfo.Summary:
As the saying goes, when it rains supervillains, it pours supervillains. But even as ACCEL hunts Radiant Black for the ultimate recharge, Marshall’s got bigger things to worry about—like repairing his reputation. And the old friend who just showed up in town. And…who’s got his dog?
RADIANT BLACK YEAR TWO begins here!
